name: Romeo
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Put Your Bot token from Botfather

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com. Below MONGOdb only for Test Don't Use Otherwise Your Bot Hack By Any Hacker

MUSIC_BOT_NAME.description: A name for your Music Bot. You can use special characters

OWNER_ID.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights !

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Fill the link of your group..
